title: Reproducible Workflows for HerbVar Projects
text:
How to move a repo from your Github to HerbVar’s

Repo Settings -> Danger Zone -> “Transfer ownership”
Click Transfer, select HerbVar Organiation as the new owner
update the link from your Rstudio Project and the (new) Repo url by entering the following commands in the terminal:


git remote -v 1
git remote add origin https://github.com/HerbVar-Network/REPOSITORY-NAME.git 2

removes link to old repo. Connects to new repo location. Be sure to replace REPOSITORY-NAME with…the name of the repository.
